reviews.sentence: Mixed Feelings About This Hotel Stay. This is a different type of review for me because I am used to leaving very positive reviews. My family and I recently stayed at the Holiday Inn Atlanta Perimeter while our home was undergoing repairs. The hotel had pretty good reviews however my experience was a little less than average. So I check in and the front desk person writes the wrong room number on the key card envelope. This was quickly corrected. We go to the room on the 2nd floor and it looks nothing like the renovated rooms that were advertised. The room was old very dimly lit and just felt creepy. I immediately called the front desk and asked to be moved to a renovated room. The front desk promptly took care of this request and moved us to the 3rd floor. We open the door to a very nicely renovated room and it reeks horribly of Marijuana. I could not believe it. I immediately called the front desk and asked to be moved once again. They gave us another renovated room on the 3rd floor. 3rd times the charm. The room was nice and comfortable however the hall reeked of Marijuana the entire stay. The fire alarm actually went off the next night because someone was smoking Marijuana in their room. There were tons of No Smoking signs throughout the hotel but I guess that did not matter. There were definitely some sketchy patrons visiting this hotel so we definitely will not go back. Not what I had expect in Dunwody. I can not believe they are able to charge what they charge. One positive point They had nice washers and dryers.

Fantastic location for where I needed to go. Comfortable meeting spaces in the lobyRom given is not even close to what was pictured. Dirty Shower was never cleaned even after requesting it be cleaned I had to clean it myself. Wi Fi is terrible. Entrance light was broken and was never repaired after being reported. I have stayed at numerous Holiday Inns over the years and have always been very satisfied with my experience. This one however was really disappointing. I really think to call this a 3 star hotel is misleading at best it is 25 and that is probably generous.

This am not your dads Holiday Inn. I booked this hotel through Hotwire and got a rate of 67 night. I needed a hotel for a visit to my daughter at GSU and within my budget. I was not thrilled when I found out it was a Holiday Inn but felt a bit better when I saw the Trip Advisor reviewsit is only about 20 minutes outside of downtown so the commute was not bad. Clearly the hotel has been renovated updated recently. The decor is fresh and modern. Our room was very spacious. Lots of different lighting. Nice TV with a great channel line up. I was with my teen son so having the extra sink outside the bathroom helped alot. He had a ball with the Kuerig machine. I appreciated the bottled water as I drink water as soon as I wake up. A few small problems1. I thought the description said the room had a refrigerator. Ours did not2. We were in 59 which faced the highway. So we got to hear traffic going by. I am a suburban girl and I am used to total silence3. We had a leak from the window because it was a rainy wekend4. We had a leak under the outer sink.

Room had not been renovated like others in motel so. Friendly staff good food at restaurant. There was mold on the ceiling in our room. We noticed it when getting ready for bed. Since it was late we turned down the offer of changing rooms. Maintenance came and promised to clean up the mold while we were gone to a conference the next day but when we came in late that afternoon it was still there. The sink was VERY slow and the commode. cover was coming off. Food at the restaurant was good but we had to ask for tea refills twice and then again for our check.

Nice Stay. Nice hotel little older. Overall nice stay. large clean room. I had come back. Very easy access to I285 and close to my meeting. Shuttle if needed. Very friendly and helpful staff. On checking first room key did not work replaced immediately. Took 3 tries for maintenance to get the stopper in lavatory to work.

The facility seems to have recently undergone renovations Which seemed to be very nice still some dated features about. It tho. The parking was not great and the cleanliness of the room was not. Award winning I saw several dead bugs in the room and the bathroom. Was cleaned in a very mediocre manner.

There is nothing good about this property. Unles you run a campground if you rent places for people to sleep during the summer in Atlanta Air Conditioning is part of what the customer pays for. At least a campground has the opportunity for an occasional breeze. This hotel does not quite understand that AC must be working all the time. As part of a several day stay many people in our party as well as others we spoke with suffered through intermittent AC outages. Sometimes at night people would wake up in oppressive heat. Coming back to the room in mid day to shower was met with no AC in the room. Indeed AC and the crumbling décor of the hotel was the main topic of the stay. Besides the AC the lobby has not been renovated for decades. The elevators smell bad and the wallpaper is peeling from the hallways. The room wallpaper is also peeling. The room carpets are damp. While shower pressure is good tub drainage is not. One day in a horribly hot midday room was a cold shower and ankle deep water in the tub. The staff really did not care all that much. When one person in our group went to the front desk to report an AC outage the response was Sorry there really is not much I can do. The bartender spent most of her time speaking to two regulars rather than waiting on other guests and then suggested that her not doing her job was somehow acceptable. they are regulars. Now what do you want. Even after being told not to clean the room until we left for the day I returned from breakfast to find that very same housekeeper in my room. When we got back to the room later in the day she did make up the room but left clearly dirty towels under the sink. Just do not stay here.
Good. modern look of the faculty. Beds were extra fluffy. My toilet was stopped up the entire weekend. there is no reason why I should have to call maintenance 3 times for a clogged toilet.

Not Impressed. The room was not very clean. There was mold on the bathroom ceiling the exhaust fan had been removed. There was a lot of mold coming from the air conditioning in the ceiling. The walls were very dirty and the wall paper was coming off. The management said they were remodeling not evident and when we told them about the mold it was cleaned only by the air conditioner when we returned that night. Was definitely not worth what we paid for. We would not stay here again.

Average at best. The hotel is average at best they said I had one of the renovated rooms but there were hole patches in the walls shower was terrible and room was not great by any means. OK for a place to sleep but not much more. The people working were friendly bar restaurant area but the overall hotel was very underwhelming.

Clean hotel. close to many things. This hotel appears to be newly remodeled. everything was new clean and smelled great. There was a few water stains on the ceiling and the air conditioner in my room was extremely loud when coming on and going off but nothing that ruined my stay. I sleep with ear plugs anyway. Room 13.

Will not stay again. This hotel is very mediocre. beds are not comfortable. weird smell. loud a c unit. walls are thin. I could hear the people in the next room cough talk and everything else. shower was not clean. the rooms are decent design wise but the hotel seems to be old and it looks like they may have updated the bathrooms etc.

Double good. We spent two nights at the newly remodeled Doubletree Dunwody. The room on the Hilton Honors floor was excellent clean fresh and very comfortable. Bar service began at 5 pm and we had dinner at the bar both nights. The food was wonderful. After the first night we wanted to try more on the menu the second night rather than venture out. I recommend the meat loaf with collard greens and creamy grits. Great meat loaf and true southern grits made to perfection. The bartender was terrific and she and the sous chef were nice enough to tell me the secrets to his delicious grits. Front desk was friendly and very helpful. The shuttle drivers were friendly and very helpful. We had breakfast the morning we left and the eggs and bacon were excellent. I want to extend my thanks to each and every staff member we encountered as you made our stay a great experience.

Wanted to like this hotel but the failed miserably. We booked this hotel and they had a nice service where you could order extra pillows I always sleep with extra pillows. Which would be great if they actually gave you the pillows. They need to pay as much attention to the things you order as they do to trying to give you a cookie. The hotel is clean and up to date with a nice decor. Hallways are clean and nicely decorated. There was a clean fresh smell in the hotel. The room appeared to be updated and mostly clean. that is about were the good ends. We stayed in Room 301 which has to be one of the worst rooms there. First it is right next to Rt 285 and you get horrible highway noise all night long. So if you want a quiet nights sleep do not stay on that side of the hotel. The A C unit in the room sounded like a jet plane taking off. In addition the room was next to the A C unit in the hallway so all night long you will get woken up by the sound of that loud unit cranking up and running. The bed was one of the worst beds we have ever slept in. We woke up with neck pain and back pain. The bed also had old sheet with grease spots on it. We stayed here for a festival and would not choose this hotel if it had not been for that.

Wonderful Location and Amazing Guest Room. We were here for a wedding I loved how comfortable the room was we stayed in a king bedroom. The bed was very comfortable and the bathroom was clean and the shower was perfect. They obviously remodeled the inside and did a wonderful job. The only signs that the hotel was a bit old was that the toilet had a slow flow and anytime you turned the air on it gave a loud squeaking noise for a bit. Other than that it was perfect will stay again.
Newly remodeled rooms clean.
Overall this was a nice stay. The room is remodeled and comfortable. The only issues we had was the lack of hot water the first night and having a long time for fresh towels.

Nice. I was deceived by the appearance from the outside but when we got inside it was nice. The dining and bar area as well as the lobby had a modern appearance. It looked like the rooms were renovated which was nice. The halls and rooms smelled fresh beds were comfortable and loved the wood floors in the entrance of the rooms and bathrooms. The ceiling however has chips and it looked like some places on the ceiling are peeling. The hotel offers a shuttle that takes you and picks you up within 5 miles that includes the Perimeter mall and a lot of other places. I would definitely come back.

Great customer service from room attendance and excellent food from there newly updated menu. I recommend it to all my friends if you try you stay here you to will have the same experience of excellency.

Great Location and Friendly Staff. Spent this past weekend in the Chamble Dunwody area for a high school reunion. This Doubletree has been recently renovated and is nice. Definitely update feels spacious and modern. The room was comfortable quiet and had good amenities. The soap products are Crabtre and Evelyn. We had at least 20 people int the bar Friday night we moved everything around basically taking over the bar staff and front desk staff could not have been any more accommodating. They even shuttled us all to a restaurant in Dunwody and picked us up to return to the hotel. Did the same Saturday to shuttle the group to Marta so we could visit the Varsity. Convenient location nice place good staff and good prices. Win win.

Great stay. The room was great. Renovations super nice but air conditioner needs updating too. Newly renovated. Very clean. Staff and service good. Our air conditioning sounded like a train whenever it started.

Best experience. I had a last minute trip to Atlanta and was able to get a room at this property. I ’ve been a very loyal Hilton Honors member for over a decade and often times stay at Doubletrees. This was the most well rounded positive experience I may have ever had at a hotel. The check in was about 30 seconds and the lobby decor was very chic and updated. They had my preferential room low floor by the elevator so I do n’t have walk far or wait for elevators in the morning. The two queen room was massive the place was spotless and quiet. The best part of the whole experience was the breakfast. While they were very busy when I went down at 745 and all the tables were dirty. They cleaned one off quickly for me. The omelet was perfectly cooked and the next pet was the pastries specifically the croissants. were extremely fresh. Most hotel breakfast have frozen pastries which is super annoying and cheap. This breakfast was amazing. The staff was incredibly gracious and helpful I think my servers name was Juan. Good guy and I should have made a point to mention him to the manager. The only downside is the toaster is too small for the fresh bred slices so you have to flip them upside down and basically cook them twice to get them toasted. Awesome experience and I will definitely try to stay there again in future trips to that part of Atlanta.
Great hotel newly renovated room and excellent bed terrific service shout out to Mariane and Charmaine and good breakfast granola. Really exceeds expectations.

Great stay and value. My husband and I enjoyed our stay here. The rooms were clean and comfortable. The check in staff was both helpful and kind. We loved the convenient location and ample parking. It was safe newly renovated and comfortable. I would recommend to anyone.

One of the Best Double Tree Hotels in Atlanta. This Double Tree Hotel was remodeled to impress deliver a great stay. This was our second stay at this Double Tree Hotel the owners of this Property designed it to give you a nice TV soft Bed Good Food.
